title: Sandeep Kumar Shivhare
subtitle:
History of #NRC
*1951:1st census,1st NRC
*1955:Citizenship Act
*1961-66:Pak immig asked to leave
*1965,71:Indo-Pak & BAN wars: Major influx of refugees in Asm
*1979:Asm Movement,kick them out
*1983-85:Asm Accord,IllegalMigrantAct
*2013:NRC to be updated-SC
#NRCFinalList 31Aug2019pic.twitter.com/GboeUpFekk
